```{r ausbeer}

library(fpp2)
library(forecast)

plot(ausbeer)
ausbeer <- window(ausbeer, start=c(1975,1))

#FOR SEASONAL DATA
plot(ausbeer)
nsdiffs(ausbeer)
ndiffs(ausbeer)
ndiffs((diff(ausbeer,5)))
tsdisplay(diff(diff(ausbeer,5)))
fit3 <- auto.arima(ausbeer,trace=TRUE, stepwise = FALSE )
fit3

#EXPLAIN THE OUTPUT: The series has a recurring seasonal pattern that repeats every s periods, which is addressed by seasonal differencing. After removing seasonality, the present value is influenced by last periodâ€™s value (AR 1), the last two noise terms (MA 1 ), seasonal dependence is captured by one lagged seasonal error term (seasonal MA 1).


#Residual Analysis
Acf(fit3$residuals)
Box.test(residuals(fit3), lag=20, type="Ljung")
plot.ts(residuals(fit3))
hist(fit3$residuals)
tsdiag(fit3)

#FORECAST
ARIMAforecast <- forecast(fit3, h=5)
plot(ARIMAforecast)
accuracy(ARIMAforecast)




```
